projects.title: Buisness Landing Page
projects.description: A landing page I created when I was running an advertising agency called Adverapse.

projects.title: Credit Fraud Detection
projects.description: A Machine Learning algorithm trained using a .csv file containing information regarding credit fraud. Represented with decision tree, k-folds, and random forest

projects.title: Bridges Health Misc Features
projects.description: A webpage made for Bridges Health Winona housing a few misc. features they wanted implemented such as a donation button, rudementary login system, and social media integration.

projects.title: CPU Scheduling Algorithms
projects.description: I wrote a program that used SJF, RR, PS, and FCFS to simulate how a CPU schedules processes.
